item.title: Guinea-Bissau soldiers say they have taken power after reports of president's arrest
item.description: Umaro Sissoco Embal√≥'s detention comes three days after a controversial presidential vote.

item.title: Where peace stands in Ukraine after frantic diplomacy
item.description: The Trump administration seems serious about reaching a deal despite all the apparent chaos around its efforts.

item.title: Nicolas Sarkozy illegal campaign financing conviction upheld
item.description: The former French president will have to serve a six-month term with an electronic bracelet, plus another six months suspended.

item.title: At least 13 dead as fire engulfs Hong Kong tower blocks
item.description: Firefighters are struggling to put out the flames and say they are unsure when the blaze will be fully contained.

item.title: Twenty-four Nigerian schoolgirls released over a week after abduction
item.description: Nigerian officials dispute reports that some 250 children remain missing after another mass school kidnap.
